text: Vassy, Calvados is a former commune. It is found in the Normandy region in the Calvados department in the northwest of France. On 1 January 2016, it was merged into the new commune of Valdallière.Arrêté préfectoral 13 October 2015 ==Related pages== *Communes of the Calvados department ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Former communes in Calvados
title: Vassy, Calvados
